ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɔ́gɔ ngie à kwoŋo wɔ́ɔn páʼa é gwɔ́ pɔ́ kwòŋ menÿɔ́g.
en: I thought he loved me when it was hypocrisy.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n zɔ́gɔ ngie à kwoŋo wɔ́ɔn páʼa á gwɔ́ pɔ́ kwòŋ menÿɔ́g.
en: I thought he loved me when it was hypocrisy.

ngiemboon: Mashʉ́ŋ vɔg tà ńgwáʼ menkwóon, á gwɔ́ máa lɔ̌ʼ.
en: When the train leaves the tracks, it's very bad.

ngiemboon: Yɔɔn tÿǒ gie á gwě nkáʼ nkwòon.
en: This is a tree that fell in the sculptor's field.
praise or respect (given to special people)
